entities.name: snape
entities.description: Snape is the one who is torturing Harry. He is shouting orders to his Death Eaters and has a sneering face.

entities.name: harry
entities.description: Harry is the one being tortured by Snape. He is trying to defend himself with his wand.

entities.name: voldemort
entities.description: Voldemort is mentioned as someone Harry hates as much as he hates Snape.

entities.name: death eater
entities.description: Death Eaters are a group of people who obey Snape's orders and run towards the gates.

relationships.description: Snape is torturing Harry with his wand.
Snape gives orders to the Death Eaters to leave Harry and run towards the gates.
Harry hates Voldemort as much as he hates Snape.
